meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Daniel Ludlam Tristan Mohabir Lynn Klyde-Allaman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7725.

td.p: Daniel Ludlam, a student from Claremont, California
Tristan Mohabir, a nonprofit associate director from Washington, D.C.
Lynn Klyde-Allaman, a journalism professor from Lafayette, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,800)

tr.td: SAGE ADVICE
BY THE NUMBERS
DISNEYLAND: YESTERDAY & TODAY
"BELL", "BOOK" & NO CANDLE
WHERE'D THAT HAPPEN?
NOVELS WITH CONFLICT
(Alex: You have to identify the conflict, the war.)
